page.title: 01WOODTON & NEARBY PARISHES
page.content: This Norfolk block includes 75% Woodton,25% Hedenham & small parts of Kirstead,Brooke & Seething,hereafter called{"Woodton Area"}.It is open countryside devoted to arable or mixed farming,but also includes part of the built-up area of Woodton,Woodton's Primary School & its round-towered church.Many families have lived here for 2 or 3 generations,but there are also many incomers drawn by its rural peace.Each parish,except Hedenham & Kirstead,has a Parish Council & all lie within the aegis of South Norfolk D.C.Though there are the farms & a few small businesses,many people must commute for work.Bus services enable people to reach nearby towns,but a high proportion own cars enabling them to get to work,visit a wider variety of shops or their doctor.
